Posts.Content: Hi Alice. I am the same as you. I have my op on the 10th dec. Its almost as though i have blocked it out and its not happening to me. I feel luckier than some ladies as i wont be having chemo or breast removal but at the same time i have my what if moments. What if they find it in my nodes etc. I just want it over. I wish u all the luck in the world xx
Posts.Title: Grade 1
